meanings.definition: Existing in or spreading through every part of something
meanings.sent1: The sweet smell of flowers pervasively filled the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The green ivy grew pervasively along the garden fence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel pervasively hid nuts in unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness pervasively touched the hearts of everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The warm sunlight pervasively bathed the meadow in a golden glow.

meanings.definition: In a way that is present or noticeable in every part of a thing or place
meanings.sent1: The music played pervasively throughout the entire house.
meanings.sent2: The scent of fresh bread pervasively wafted from the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The laughter pervasively echoed down the empty hallway.
meanings.sent4: Her smile pervasively brightened even the gloomiest days.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of coffee pervasively lingered in the cozy cafe.
